jd: From: Pradeep, Scalable Systems pradeep.sharma@scalable-systems.com Reply to: pradeep.sharma@scalable-systems.com Hi,Greetings of the day! I have an urgent requirement below, please go through JD and let me know if you are comfortable or have any profile. Kindly revert me back with your updated resume as well. Job Title: Project Manager having OTC experience Location: Austin, TX/ Cupertino, CA (Work from Office)Duration: Long Term Contract Key Responsibilities:Project Manager having OTC experience with at least 1 S/4 HANA migration/Implementation experience.Ability to work with PMO, technical, and functional teams to gather requirements on project timeline, put project build plan for systems, and deliver the environments in support of project timeline.Provided technical management oversight to support the project planning and execution for infrastructure and build activities, delivery of environments for development phase, integration, user acceptance, and performance test phases, and dress rehearsal, to cutoverClear understanding of project life cycle of System Conversion projects and dual landscape management from Development, Integration Test, User Acceptance Test, Dress Rehearsal, and Cutover. Thanks & Regards, Pradeep SharmaEmail: pradeep.sharma@scalable-systems.com "Scalable Systems is an Equal Opportunity Employer.
